name: Introduction to the Let's Code editing screen
description: Let's get started with Let's Code with a quick overview of the interface, and an introduction to the stage where we create our apps.

steps.contents:
This is the main screen of Let's Code.

Let's take a tour...
This central area is called the Stage, and it's where the app that you're creating is displayed.
At the top is a toolbar, where you can do a number of things on the project you're working on.
The name of the project or lesson that you're working on is shown here.
Click on your username to sign out when you're finished working.
You can close the project and return to the home screen at any time.
Click on Help at any time to get assistance on what you're doing.

Below the stage is the editing panel, where we can edit the parts of our project.

We'll start using this in the next tutorial.

That's it for the first lesson! Let's recap:

The stage contains the app that we're creating

The edit panel is where we edit our app

The toolbar has other project controls, and where we can get help

In the next lesson, we'll start to create our first app!
